# Welcome

This is a Quarto-based personal knowledge management system for organizing interconnected notes, literature, and data.

## Recently Added Topics

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

# Get all .qmd files in aggregators/ directory (excluding index.qmd)
files <- list.files("primary", pattern = "\\.qmd$", full.names = TRUE)
files <- files[!grepl("index\\.qmd$", files)]

# Get file modification times
file_info <- data.frame(
  path = files,
  mtime = file.mtime(files),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

# Sort by modification time (most recent first) and take top 10
file_info <- file_info[order(file_info$mtime, decreasing = TRUE), ]
file_info <- head(file_info, 10)

# Read titles from YAML frontmatter and create links
for (i in 1:nrow(file_info)) {
  file_path <- file_info$path[i]

  # Read the file to extract title
  lines <- readLines(file_path, warn = FALSE)
  yaml_end <- which(lines == "---")[2]
  yaml_lines <- lines[2:(yaml_end-1)]
  title_line <- yaml_lines[grepl("^title:", yaml_lines)]

  if (length(title_line) > 0) {
    # Extract title (remove 'title: ' and quotes)
    title <- sub("^title:\\s*[\"']?(.+?)[\"']?\\s*$", "\\1", title_line)
    title <- gsub('^"(.*)"$', '\\1', title)
    title <- gsub("^'(.*)'$", '\\1', title)

    # Create markdown link
    file_name <- basename(file_path)
    cat(sprintf("- [%s](primary/%s)\n", title, file_name))
  }
}
```

## Structure

- **[Primary Notes](primary/index.qmd)**: Declarative notes with structured content (e.g., "X causes Y")
- **[Aggregator Notes](aggregators/index.qmd)**: Collections of notes organized by topic
- **Data**: Raw datasets for visualization and analysis

## Getting Started

Browse the primary notes to explore individual concepts, or check the aggregator notes to see thematic collections.
